page.title: 15PIPING con.
page.content: Pipe Band.But we used the school for practise and we decided to call it the Lochaber High School Pipe Band and it has been successful under that name.I am not the Pipe Major it is Mr.McDonald who works on the railway. He was the Pipe Major of Junior Band when I came here.I kept him as Pipe Major even when I came to teach the Pipe Band. Question. Whats likely to happen when you retire in the future. Answer. Well I hope they will get another instructor to replace me. And he will get the same pupils I get.
